title: Snoop Dogg uses 'Frozen' to encourage people to 'let it go' -- and Idina Menzel responds
description: No matter his fame and notoriety, rapper Snoop Dogg proved that he's just like the rest of us -- he, too, sometimes needs to jam out to music in his car to relieve stress. But his choice of music might surprise you.

title: Bids for rock legend's guitar start at $1M
description: A guitar Kurt Cobain played during Nirvana's 'MTV Unplugged in New York' live concert could sell for $1 million.

title: The dangerous consequences of Trump's oversight purge
Gov. Cuomo takes Covid-19 test during live briefing
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo got a coronavirus test during his daily news briefing, saying "it is so fast and so easy that even the governor can take this test."

title: Health officials double down on the dangers of mass gatherings as US states reopen
description: Just as more Americans are allowed to visit beaches, attend church indoors or eat inside a restaurant, health officials say gathering in large groups could send states back to where they started.

title: Covid-19 offers a chance to build a better world. We must seize it.
description: The coronavirus alone didn't itself break our world. It just exposed a world that was already breaking.

title: Atlas V launches for US Space Force mission
description: The United Launch Alliance launched its Atlas V rocket for the new government agency's mission, which includes deploying a small satellite and conducting experiments for NASA

title: Trump is encouraging supporters to confront reporters
description: CNN's Brian Stelter says President Donald Trump's cycle of anti-media attacks present challenges for members of the press.

title: Tropical Storm Arthur forms in the Atlantic
description: Two weeks before the official start to Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Arthur has become the first named storm of the year.

title: State polls suggest Biden has a clear national lead
description: Poll of the week: A new Marquette Law School poll finds former Vice President Joe Biden with a 46% to 43% lead over President Donald Trump in Wisconsin.

title: CNN anchor to Trump official: This is nothing to celebrate
description: CNN's Jake Tapper presses Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar about the high death toll in the US from Covid-19.

title: Three countries have already defaulted on their debt this year. These may be next
description: This is no time to be a country that relies heavily on tourism to keep its economy going. Combine that with a huge debt load and weak fiscal policies, and that's a recipe for financial disaster.

title: Social distancing could wipe out the restaurant industry
description: The US state of Georgia allowed restaurants to reopen on April 27. The three owned by Ryan Pernice are still shuttered.

title: Is this how the second wave starts?
description: With the virus largely contained in China, life is slowly returning to normal there. Lockdowns have eased while some schools and factories have reopened.

title: Coronavirus has devastated Moscow. Now it's spreading across Russia's 11 time zones to ill-funded regions
description: Russia hit a grim Covid-19 milestone this week: According to Johns Hopkins University, the country now ranks second in the world for confirmed coronavirus cases.

title: Trump's pivot to economy leaves leadership vacuum on US pandemic response
Chinese ambassador to Israel is found dead in his home, Foreign Ministry says
description: The Chinese ambassador to Israel, Du Wei, was found dead Sunday morning inside his official residence north of Tel Aviv.

title: Nick Kyrgios lets fly at Novak Djokovic in lockdown chat
description: After downing what he thought was about six glasses of wine, a tipsy looking Nick Kyrgios told good friend Andy Murray that he thought the former Wimbledon champion was better than Novak Djokovic.

title: She had to give birth while in a coma. Five weeks later, she's finally met her baby
description: Alicia Kappers doesn't remember her contractions or her baby's first cries. Other than her newborn son, her only reminder of that day is the scar from her cesarean section.

title: Lack of immunity means China is vulnerable to another wave of coronavirus, top adviser warns
description: China still faces the "big challenge" of a potential second wave of Covid-19 infections, the country's top respiratory authority has warned, with the lack of immunity among the community a serious concern as the race to develop a vaccine continues.

title: Top adviser warns China vulnerable to second wave
description: China still faces the "big challenge" of a potential second wave of Covid-19 infections, the country's top respiratory authority has warned, with the lack of immunity among the community a serious concern as the race to develop a vaccine continues. CNN's David Culver has the exclusive interview with Dr. Zhong Nanshan.

title: Tourist arrested in Hawaii after posting beach pictures on Instagram
description: A tourist from New York was arrested in Hawaii after he posted beach pictures on Instagram when he was supposed to be in quarantine.

title: Watch Obama's coronavirus commencement speech
description: Former President Barack Obama told college graduates that the "folks in charge" don't always know what they're doing in rare public criticism of the Trump administration.

title: The US relies on India for generic drugs. But China controls that supply chain
description: Sarah Thebarge, a 41-year-old physician assistant living in San Francisco, takes a pill every day to treat her lupus, a chronic condition that causes unbearable joint pain, fatigue and fainting spells.
